MonsterTrait.Name: Innate Spellcasting
MonsterTrait.Text: The gremlin's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 11). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: prestidigitation 3/day: hex

MonsterTrait.Name: Magic Resistance
MonsterTrait.Text: The gremlin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The goblin makes one claw attack and one bite attack.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Claws
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Aura of Drunkenness
MonsterTrait.Text: A rum gremlin radiates an aura of drunkenness to a radius of 20 feet. Every creature that starts its turn in the aura must make a successful DC 12 Constitution saving throw against poison or be poisoned for one hour.
